thoughts.text: I think I will start by listing the files in the current directory to see what I have available to work with.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing files will give me an idea of what resources I have available and what I can work with.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the "list_files" command to list the files in the current directory
- Review the list of files to determine what resources are available
- Decide on next steps based on available resources
thoughts.criticism: I could have planned a more specific task to accomplish, rather than just listing files.
